overview:
Jason Powers is the VP of Clinic Services for Therapydia and is responsible for strategic management and operational development of Therapydia’s partner clinics.

Prior to joining Therapydia, Jason worked as an acquisitions and operations director for two commercial real estate private equity firms with a geographic focus on the southwestern United States. In those roles, he focused on deal sourcing, investment underwriting, contract negotiation, due diligence efforts, and ongoing management of acquired assets. During his tenure, he helped close approximately $75 million in equity transactions and managed a legacy portfolio of approximately $100 million . Jason also spent several years working for Bain & Company, a top-level strategy consulting firm where he focused on providing executives of major U.S. corporations with strategic analysis and business recommendations.

Born in Newport Beach, CA, Jason graduated with distinction from Stanford University, concurrently earning his B.S. and M.S. in Management Science & Engineering. He later attended Stanford’s Graduate School of Business where he earned his MBA. Jason is an outdoors and active lifestyle enthusiast and in his spare time enjoys surfing, swimming, wake boarding, snowboarding, mountain biking, and scuba diving.
